mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAT VALUES ( null -- chat_idx , now() -- chat_datetime , #{chat_content} -- chat_content , #{chat_content_type} -- chat_content_type , #{chat_room_idx} -- chat_room_idx , #{member_id} -- member_id )

mapper.update: UPDATE SECONDHAND SET secondhand_deal_status = "예약중" WHERE secondhand_idx = #{secondhand_idx};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ZMAN_DELIVERY ( zman_delivery_startspot , zman_delivery_endspot , zman_delivery_commission , zman_delivery_status , seller_id , buyer_id , order_secondhand_idx ) VALUES ( NULL -- zman_delivery_startspot 판매자가 넣기 , NULL -- zman_delivery_endspot 구매자가 넣기 , 3000 -- zman_delivery_commission(default) , "입력 중" -- zman_delivery_status , #{seller_id} -- seller_id 판매자id , #{buyer_id} -- buyer_id 구매자id , #{order_secondhand_idx} -- order_secondhand_idx )
